rules.text:
你發佈的內容屬於你，你需要為它們負責。
You own what you post and are responsible for it.

請勿發佈惡意、傷害性、騷擾、歧視或非法的內容。

No malicious, abusive, harassment, discriminatory, violent or illegal content.

我們不保證能長期在線，或者效能流暢。請緊記備份。

We cannot guarantee the availability or performance of this service.

你的 IP 位址、活動時間、活動網址均有紀錄，以作維護本站服務用途。

Your IP address, time, request URL is logged on the server for maintenance purpose.

伺服器守則可能會在未來進行修訂。

This server rule may be modified in the future.
